header.title: Footnotes MOD
header.description: Add a BBCode [note] to put notes on the bottom of message.

action-group.diy-instructions:
To complete the installation go to the Administration Control Panel and click on the CONTENTS tab. Click on "Added new BBCode" and insert the following line in the "BBCode usage" textarea:
[note]{TEXT}[/note]
Then add
Add note on the bottom of the message
in the "Help line" input line.
Finally check the "Display on posting page" box and then press "Submit".
